content.text: Match ends, Mamelodi Sundowns 1, Barcelona 3.
Second Half ends, Mamelodi Sundowns 1, Barcelona 3.
Substitution, Mamelodi Sundowns. Thapelo Morena replaces Anele Ngcongca.
Substitution, Mamelodi Sundowns. Lucky Mohomi replaces Samuel Mabunda.
Substitution, Mamelodi Sundowns. George Lebese replaces Themba Zwane.
Attempt saved. Gastón Sirino (Mamelodi Sundowns) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jeremy Brockie.
Attempt blocked. André Gomes (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Aleix Vidal with a cross.
Substitution, Mamelodi Sundowns. Jeremy Brockie replaces Percy Tau.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Motjeka Madisha.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Paco Alcácer.
Offside, Mamelodi Sundowns. Themba Zwane tries a through ball, but Percy Tau is caught offside.
Offside, Mamelodi Sundowns. Themba Zwane tries a through ball, but Percy Tau is caught offside.
Corner,  Mamelodi Sundowns. Conceded by Jordi Alba.

Offside, Mamelodi Sundowns. Gastón Sirino tries a through ball, but Themba Zwane is caught offside.

Substitution, Mamelodi Sundowns. Oupa Manyisa replaces Khama Billiat.
Goal!  Mamelodi Sundowns 1, Barcelona 3. Sibusiso Vilakazi (Mamelodi Sundowns) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Percy Tau.
Attempt missed. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range is too high. Assisted by Lionel Messi following a corner.
Substitution, Barcelona. Lionel Messi replaces Inigo Ruiz de Galarreta.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Kennedy Mweene.
Attempt saved. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. André Gomes (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Aleix Vidal with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Wayne Arendse.
Attempt blocked. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Aleix Vidal.

Khama Billiat (Mamelodi Sundowns) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Inigo Ruiz de Galarreta (Barcelona).

Percy Tau (Mamelodi Sundowns) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Second Half begins Mamelodi Sundowns 0, Barcelona 2.
